title: What is a Quantum Computer?
text: Quantum computers use qubits instead of bits. They leverage superposition and entanglement to solve problems much faster than classical computers.

title: Introduction to Machine Learning
text: Machine learning enables computers to learn from data without explicit programming. It is the foundation of AI applications.

title: Artificial intelligence
text: Artificial intelligence (AI) is the capability of computational systems to perform tasks typically associated with human intelligence
